Normal Text

Lorem markdownum artesque tu quidem lanigeris! Amari aliquis Ismarios, hospitiique nullum ab enim Pagasaea probabant armis iniuria inponi. Primus Aonius graves at inductas nec motu, qui pinetis. Anxius nec ibimus utque illa circa video est fuit labores alas. Huic per quantum undis, Themis et quamvis gramine missisque leonibus.

Blockquotes

Meo locum plurimus laudatos exstantibus fistula nocte Ancaeo denique montanum. Dissipat nullique tenax; aut una lacessit purpureus sumptis inlaesos, Polypemonis quisque blanditus. Obscenas rumpitque numerum effluxere, pronusque: Mygdonidesque precantia erat potes undis. Resurgere conplet velut freta miram enim, maiorque nec nec inaniter mensura et ipse artus flebam gentisque solus.

Codeblock

Here a sample text which contains <?php echo 'inline code'; ?> and also code blocks.

function visitor(node) {
  try {
    const alignment = node.align;

    visit(node, "tableRow", (rowNode) => {
      rowNode.children.forEach(function(cellNode, index) {
        cellNode.align = alignment[index];
      });
    });

    node.align = node.align.map(function(value) {
      return null;
    });
  } catch (e) {}
}
